  * Computer Architectures

  * Electronic Design Automation
 
  * Embeded Electronic Systems
   
  * Procedure Oriented Programming
  
     * Firmware Development
     
     * Kernel Development
     
     * Systems Programming
     
     * Algorithm Optimization
